resources.string: If the Scanned Code List is empty. Please Scan Qrcode or Barcode first.

Note:

Scan Code Button: This button enables QR/BAR code scanning. Once scanned, press the UPLOAD button to upload the code to the server.
After uploading, click the Show Scanned List Button to view all the uploaded QR/BAR codes.

Important:

I am utilizing a Render-free server for the API. Please be aware that the initial attempt might take a bit longer due to server initialization.
